category_description: Directional slide transitions including slides, pushes, reveals, whip-pans, and folds

transitions.name: slide-left
transitions.long_description: New wallpaper slides in from the right edge, moving left to cover the old wallpaper. With keep_image mode, the old image stays in place while the new one slides over it.

transitions.name: slide-right
transitions.long_description: New wallpaper slides in from the left edge, moving right. This is the opposite direction of slide-left.

transitions.name: slide-up
transitions.long_description: New wallpaper slides in from the bottom edge, moving upward to cover the old wallpaper.

transitions.name: slide-down
transitions.long_description: New wallpaper slides in from the top edge, moving downward. This is the opposite direction of slide-up.

transitions.name: whip-pan-left
transitions.long_description: Rapid slide transition from right to left, creating a whip-pan camera movement effect. Uses half the frames for a faster, more energetic transition.

transitions.name: whip-pan-right
transitions.long_description: Rapid slide transition from left to right, mimicking a quick camera whip-pan movement.

transitions.name: whip-pan-up
transitions.long_description: Rapid upward slide transition, creating a fast vertical whip-pan effect.

transitions.name: whip-pan-down
transitions.long_description: Rapid downward slide transition for a dynamic vertical movement effect.

transitions.name: push-left
transitions.long_description: Both old and new wallpapers move together to the left. The old image slides out as the new one pushes in. Always uses keep_image=False mode.

transitions.name: push-right
transitions.long_description: Both wallpapers move together to the right, with the new image pushing the old one out of view.

transitions.name: push-up
transitions.long_description: Both wallpapers move upward together, with the new image pushing the old one out from the bottom.

transitions.name: push-down
transitions.long_description: Both wallpapers move downward together, creating a unified push effect from top to bottom.

transitions.name: fold-left
transitions.long_description: Similar to slide-left but with a folding visual metaphor. Creates the impression of the wallpaper being folded over to reveal the next one.

transitions.name: fold-right
transitions.long_description: Folding effect from left to right, opposite direction of fold-left.

transitions.name: fold-up
transitions.long_description: Vertical folding effect from bottom to top, creating a paper-fold visual metaphor.

transitions.name: fold-down
transitions.long_description: Vertical folding effect from top to bottom, opposite direction of fold-up.
